name: Wallflower
description:
Loop gif rework from my illustration back in 2013, a reinterpretation of a poem titled “Bunga dan Tembok” (“Flowers and Walls”), by Wiji Thukul, Indonesian activist and poet that missing during political turmoil in 1998.

In 2014 this piece became a book cover for “Nyanyian Akar Rumput” (“The Song Of Grassroots”), poems collection by Wiji Thukul.

2500x2500px
